scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.cap:init: ionic cap init app-kick-off com.example.appkickoff --web-dir=dist || true
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && ionic cap sync --no-build
scripts.android: npm run build && ionic cap build android --no-build
scripts.android:no-open: npm run build && ionic cap build android --no-open --no-build
scripts.android:dev: npm run build && CAPACITOR_CONFIG=capacitor.config.dev.ts ionic cap build android --no-open --no-build && ionic cap run android --external
scripts.android:dev:live: npm run build && CAPACITOR_CONFIG=capacitor.config.dev.ts ionic cap build android --no-open --no-build && ionic cap run android --external -l
scripts.android:debug: adb shell input keyevent 82 && npm run android:logs
scripts.ios: npm run build && ionic cap build ios --no-build
scripts.ios:no-open: npm run build && ionic cap build ios --no-open --no-build
scripts.ios:dev: npm run build && CAPACITOR_CONFIG=capacitor.config.dev.ts ionic cap build ios --no-open --no-build && ionic cap run ios
scripts.ios:dev:live: npm run build && CAPACITOR_CONFIG=capacitor.config.dev.ts ionic cap build ios --no-open --no-build && ionic cap run ios -l
scripts.web:preview: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.info:versions: echo '=== Node ===' && node -v && echo '=== NPM ===' && npm -v && echo '=== Ionic ===' && ionic --version && echo '=== TypeScript ===' && npx tsc --version
scripts.help: echo 'üì± App Kick Off - Ionic Commands' && echo '' && echo 'üöÄ WEB DEVELOPMENT:' && echo '  npm run dev              - Start Ionic dev server' && echo '  npm run dev:debug        - Start with debug logs' && echo '  npm run dev:no-open      - Start without opening browser' && echo '  npm run serve            - Alias for dev' && echo '  npm run serve:external   - Dev server accessible from network' && echo '' && echo 'üî® BUILD:' && echo '  npm run build            - Build for production' && echo '  npm run build:report     - Build and show bundle size' && echo '  npm run type-check       - Check TypeScript' && echo '' && echo 'üßπ CLEANUP:' && echo '  npm run clean            - Clean all (dist + node_modules)' && echo '  npm run clean:dist       - Clean only dist/' && echo '  npm run clean:cache      - Clean only cache' && echo '' && echo 'ü§ñ ANDROID:' && echo '  npm run android          - Build for Android Studio' && echo '  npm run android:no-open  - Build without opening Studio' && echo '  npm run android:dev      - Dev mode with live reload' && echo '  npm run android:dev:live - Dev with live reload enabled' && echo '  npm run android:run      - Run on device/emulator' && echo '  npm run android:run:live - Run with live reload' && echo '  npm run android:run:device - Run on specific device' && echo '  npm run android:studio   - Open Android Studio' && echo '  npm run android:logs     - View device logs' && echo '' && echo 'üçé iOS:' && echo '  npm run ios              - Build for Xcode' && echo '  npm run ios:no-open      - Build without opening Xcode' && echo '  npm run ios:dev          - Dev mode with live reload' && echo '  npm run ios:dev:live     - Dev with live reload enabled' && echo '  npm run ios:run          - Run on simulator' && echo '  npm run ios:run:live     - Run with live reload' && echo '  npm run ios:run:device   - Run on specific device' && echo '  npm run ios:xcode        - Open Xcode' && echo '  npm run ios:logs         - View simulator logs' && echo '' && echo 'üõ†Ô∏è  TOOLS:' && echo '  npm run info             - Show Ionic info' && echo '  npm run info:versions    - Show all versions' && echo '  npm run info:cap         - Capacitor help' && echo '  npm run help             - Show this help'
